安全保障条約: (あんぜんほしょうじょうやく) - US-Japan Security Treaty
安全保障理事会: (あんぜんほしょうりじかい) - (UN) Security Council
安全保障貿易管理: (あんぜんほしょうぼうえきかんり) - Security Export Control
安全剃刀: (あんぜんかみそり) - safety razor
安全圏: (あんぜんけん) - safety zone; buffer (e.g. against defeat)
安全基準: (あんぜんきじゅん) - safety standards
安全対策: (あんぜんたいさく) - safety measure
安全帯: (あんぜんたい) - safety belt (typically used in Japanese construction work); fall-prevention harness
安全帽: (あんぜんぼう) - safety helmet; crash helmet; hard hat
安全情報: (あんぜんじょうほう) - safety information; safety bulletin
安全措置: (あんぜんそち) - safety measure; safety precaution
安全教育: (あんぜんきょういく) - safety education
安全日: (あんぜんび) - safe day (one on which conception is unlikely to occur)
安全標識: (あんぜんひょうしき) - safety mark
安全牌: (あんぜんパイ) - {mahj} tile that may be discarded without risking benefiting an opponent; no-risk choice/easily handled person
安全確保: (あんぜんかくほ) - maintenance of safety; safety guarantee; ensuring safety
安全確認: (あんぜんかくにん) - safety confirmation; confirming (something) is safe
安全神話: (あんぜんしんわ) - safety myth; myth that something is completely safe (e.g. nuclear plant); safety dogma
安全第一: (あんぜんだいいち) - safety first
安全管理: (あんぜんかんり) - safety administration; safety control; safety management
安全管理者: (あんぜんかんりしゃ) - safety officer; safety administrator
安全網: (あんぜんもう) - safety net; security net
安全衛生教育: (あんぜんえいせいきょういく) - safety education
安全設計要件: (あんぜんせっけいようけん) - safety design requirement
安全運転: (あんぜんうんてん) - safe driving
安南都護府: (アンナンとごふ) - Protectorate General of Annam; Han-period Chinese office established in Hanoi in 622 CE
安史の乱: (あんしのらん) - An-Shi Rebellion (755-763 CE); An Lushan Rebellion
安否不明: (あんぴふめい) - (yoji) fate (safety) of a person (persons) being unknown
安否確認: (あんぴかくにん) - confirmation of someone's safety; ascertainment of someone's safety
安土: (あずち) - mound on which targets are placed (in archery); firing mound
安土時代: (あづちじだい) - Azuchi period (first half of the Azuchi-Momoyama period, 1568-1582 CE)
安土桃山: (あずちももやま) - Azuchi-Momoyama period (approx. 1558-1600 CE)
安土桃山時代: (あづちももやまじだい) - Azuchi-Momoyama period (approx. 1558-1600 CE)
安堵: (あんど) - relief/reassurance; recognition of right to land ownership (by the shogunate, a feudal lord, etc.); (orig. meaning) living safely surrounded by walls
安堵感: (あんどかん) - sense of relief; feeling of relief
安壜: (やすびん) - cheap bottle (e.g. of alcohol)
安売り: (やすうり) - discount; bargain sale; selling cheaply
安宅船: (あたけぶね) - large warship of the Muromachi and early Edo periods
安安: (やすやす) - calmly; peacefully; painlessly; comfortably
安定した: (あんていした) - steady; stable; calm; firm
安定同位体: (あんていどういたい) - stable isotope
安定性: (あんていせい) - stability; security; equilibrium
安定恐慌: (あんていきょうこう) - stabilization crisis; stabilisation crisis
安定感: (あんていかん) - sense of stability
安定成長: (あんていせいちょう) - stable growth
安定期: (あんていき) - stable period (with ref. to pregnancy, typically from 4th month when the placenta is fully formed, morning sickness usually goes away and risk of miscarriage decreases)
安定株主: (あんていかぶぬし) - strong stockholder
安定液: (あんていえき) - slurry; clay suspension
安定状態: (あんていじょうたい) - steady state; stable state
安定解析: (あんていかいせき) - stability analysis
安定陸塊: (あんていりくかい) - stable land-mass
安寧秩序: (あんねいちつじょ) - (yoji) peace and order; law and order
安居: (あんご) - varsika (meditation retreat; usu. for 90 days starting on the 15th day of the 4th month of the lunisolar calendar)
安康: (あんこう) - calm and peaceful period of time
安心安全: (あんしんあんぜん) - safe and secure
安心感: (あんしんかん) - sense of security
安心立命: (あんじんりつめい) - (yoji) spiritual peace and enlightenment; keeping an unperturbed mind through faith
安息香酸: (あんそくこうさん) - benzoic acid
安息香酸ソーダ: (あんそくこうさんソーダ) - sodium benzoate
安息香酸ナトリウム: (あんそくこうさんなとりうむ) - sodium benzoate
安房船貝: (アワブネガイ) - Bostrycapulus gravispinosus (species of spiny slipper snail)
安排: (あんばい) - (esp. 塩梅) seasoning/flavour/flavor; (esp. 塩梅) condition/state/situation; (esp. 按排, 按配, 案配, 安排) arrangement/assignment/adjustment
安普請: (やすぶしん) - cheap structure (e.g. of houses)
